Category: Toners/Astringents

book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)

chunk:
olysorbate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Essential Oil, Tetrasodium EDTA,

Directions: Apply to a cotton pad or directly on to face. If using a cotton pad, swipe from the inside of the face out. If applying directly, pat gently into skin. Follow up with Headshot Face Oil and/or Curtain Call Clarifying Moisturizer.

Ingredient concerns: HI
book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)
